items.title: Backend Engineering
items.description: C# .NET Core, Microservices, REST APIs, CQRS, Clean Architecture, SignalR
items.best: Stateless services, clear separation of command/query logic, domain-driven modularization, and async event-driven flow.
items.improvable: Tight coupling between APIs and DB models — adopt contracts + interfaces. Roadmap: isolate business logic, introduce message brokers, add failover patterns.
items.bad: Massive service controllers, logic in controllers, circular dependencies, synchronous I/O in production flows.

items.title: Frontend Engineering
items.description: Vue 3, TypeScript, Blazor, UI Composition, SPA Lifecycle, Progressive Enhancement
items.best: Composable architecture, reactive state control, consistent component APIs, minimal DOM footprint.
items.improvable: Overusing watchers and deep reactivity — move to computed pipelines. Roadmap: refactor heavy components into slots and composables.
items.bad: Direct DOM manipulation, global state pollution, tight coupling between UI and logic.

items.title: Cloud & DevOps
items.description: Docker, Azure DevOps, GitHub Actions, CI/CD, Cloud Deployment, Observability
items.best: Immutable builds, declarative IaC, least privilege secrets handling, and pipeline versioning.
items.improvable: Manual container linking — use Compose networking or service discovery. Roadmap: integrate environment matrix testing and ephemeral staging.
items.bad: Storing secrets in YAML, building images on live agents, SSHing into production containers.

items.title: Databases & Persistence
items.description: SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Firebase, Query Optimization
items.best: Index-aware schema design, transaction safety, CQRS split reads/writes, caching hot paths.
items.improvable: Lack of monitoring — introduce slow query logs. Roadmap: shard by domain, apply read replicas, test migrations under load.
items.bad: ORM misuse, raw concatenated queries, unbounded result sets, schema drift in CI/CD.

items.title: Quality & Automation
items.description: xUnit, NUnit, Playwright, Selenium, Postman, Automated QA, Integration Testing
items.best: Pipeline-based validation, isolated mocks, and test-driven infrastructure consistency.
items.improvable: Low coverage on async code paths. Roadmap: enforce integration test gates, add mutation testing for logic coverage.
items.bad: Manual testing reliance, test order dependency, shared state across tests.

items.title: Architecture & Leadership
items.description: System Design, Team Leadership, Agile, CI/CD-first Culture, Fortune 500 Delivery
items.best: Lead by demonstration, establish architectural standards, teach reasoning not obedience.
items.improvable: Reactive leadership — build proactive mentorship cadence. Roadmap: define team-level autonomy layers and measurable trust metrics.
items.bad: Code policing, gatekeeping reviews, emotional decisions over systemic evidence.
